hero.title: About Our Islamic Center
hero.subtitle: Discover our journey, mission, and the dedicated individuals who make our community thrive.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.statement: To establish a vibrant Islamic community that promotes faith, knowledge, and service. We strive to be a beacon of Islamic values, providing spiritual guidance, educational resources, and community support for Muslims in Babura and beyond.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.statement: To create a sustainable Islamic ecosystem where every Muslim can grow spiritually, intellectually, and socially. We envision a future where our center serves as a model for Islamic excellence and community development throughout Nigeria.

timelines.title: 1995: Foundation
timelines.text: The AN Islamic Center was established as a small community gathering place by the late Abubakar Nakore and his family.

timelines.title: 2002: Mosque Construction
timelines.text: With community support, we completed construction of our main mosque building, accommodating 500 worshippers.

timelines.title: 2008: Islamic School
timelines.text: We established our Islamic school, providing Quranic education and modern academics to over 200 students.

timelines.title: 2015: Waqf Establishment
timelines.text: The center was formally dedicated as a perpetual Waqf, ensuring its continuity for future generations.

timelines.title: 2023: Expansion
timelines.text: We completed our community center expansion, adding new facilities for youth programs and community events.

governance.title: Governance Structure
governance.subtitle: Our organizational structure ensures transparent and effective management according to Islamic principles.

trustee.title: Board of Trustees
trustee.subtitle: Policy & Oversight
trustee.brief: The Board of Trustees consists of at least five members of proven integrity, with at least one member from the progeny of the late Abubakar Nakore.

responsibilities.title: Responsibilities
items: Make main policy decisions for the Center
Appoint members to the Board of Management
Replace deceased, dismissed or resigned members

trustee.quote: Members are selected based on proven integrity and commitment to Islamic values.

management.title: Board of Management
management.subtitle: Day-to-Day Operations
management.brief: The Board of Management consists of at least eleven members responsible for daily operations and accountable to the Board of Trustees.
management.quote: The Board of Management implements policies set by the Board of Trustees.

governance.relationshipNote: The Board of Management is responsible to the Board of Trustees • No person serves on both boards simultaneously
